column4: I think my luck has given up. I can't install Ubuntu using the disc. I go to click on the Install Inside of Windows 7, and wham. Asks me to take out installation media and it just restarts the computer.
Why not just boot from the CD or use a USB?
Dont "boot" it while windows is running.

I think its the partition thats screwing up on install. Best bet while installing is let the install use your entire harddrive, or manually partition it if you know what your doing. But i gather you want to dual boot along side WIN 7 and not destroy it
